name: Ryan Gray
text: I've been here twice for lunch and have gotten the BBQ chicken and their Buffalo Chicken, both of which are good pizzas I'd recommend.  I went with someone else and tried a bite of their meat lovers though and wasn't a huge fan of their red â€¦More

name: Laurie B
text: Best gluten free pizza!  For non-dairy peeps, they even have Daiya cheese.  No need to worry about the cost of addl toppings - toppings are unlimited at one price!  And service is super quick.  Also love the new seltzer water - an Anheuser Busch product - Alta Palla.

name: Steve W.
text: Great pizza and even better staff. It is rare to find employees who genuinely care about your experience. Our family enjoyed our experience very much. We will be back for sure. Pizza is tasty. Price is reasonable. What's not to love?

name: Constance N. Johnson
text: Great atmosphere, great staff, great food!

name: Snehith Panguluri
text: This is a great pizza place and I liked the concept of build your own where we can choose everything from the crust to the toppings. The ambience is really good and the staff are friendly too. The buffalo chicken topping is really awesome ðŸ˜Ž. They also have extra cheese and crushed red peppers on the tables for convenience.

name: Neal Miller
text: Fast casual for pizza.  Basically the same concept as a couple Mexican restaurants where you go through the line and select the ingredients for your custom pizza.  They also have some house recipes in case you aren't confident in picking â€¦More

name: Jonnathan J Rodriguez
text: Great pizza! You can pick and make with all the ingredients you want. The price is pretty good! And the quality of the ingredients also surprised me... I think I would totally go back for some pizza to this place.

name: Rebecca Dutton
text: Beyond amazing place, came in 30 mins to close and the shift leader was beyond sweet and accommodating. Pizza was 10/10, and prices were amazing!  My husband's and I new favorite pizza place

name: Brooke Pratt
text: I really like the pizza here and would rate this place higher if we didn't almost always have a problem here. It takes so long to get the pizzas made, you end up standing in line for a pretty long time if there is any body in front of you â€¦More

name: Jeff Kyker
text: Wonderful experience.  Great pizza. My daughter doesnâ€™t like red sauce so they just used butter sauce.

name: Emily Hughes
text: Great pizza and great location.  Our pizza was hot and fast. I ordered the gluten free crust with vegan cheese and it was really good.  Thank you for having those options!

name: Tina Sarni
text: Amazing veggie pizza...

name: David Wright
text: Always fast and always nice. It's a personal pan pizza for the price of a large pizza anywhere else but it's still tasty. â€¦More

name: Gary Stull
text: First time there... a Subway for pizza! We had an off the menu pizza. Next time... look out. The sky's the limit!!! Neat experience that doesn't break the bank.

name: Barry Parsons
text: The food is really good, but the service was not up to par. I contacted management and they offered coupons to make it right. That is the only reason I didn't rate it lower, because the service was some of the worst I've ever experienced. It was just one person, but she made me not want to come back.

name: shawn the lesser
text: A healthier way to pizza. And a nice place to go. My only negative is that something more creative and comfortable could be done with the seating. Thanks!

name: Brock Montgomery
text: The best thing about Pieology is there thick crust pizza. It is surprisingly delicious. The have a decent selection of toppings as well.

name: A O
text: Not coming to this location again.  The staff was rude and didn't honor our Groupon for its face value. Also I ordered a gluten free pizza (specified that it is an allergy) and they did put the pizza on a different pan in the oven, which is â€¦More

name: Turtle Kami
text: I went there today with a couple friends and I tried the PieRise crust and while the toppings were tasty, the pizza was unevenly cooked and mostly underdone. I bit into the 2nd slice and got a gummy bite of pizza dough. The outer crust was browned but beneath the sauce was a gooey layer of uncooked dough. Not cool.

name: Nate Trav
text: Neat place. I don't live anywhere near a restaurant like this so it was a fun experience. The pizza was good too.

name: Joy AbuShanab
text: Great make your own pizza with fresh ingredients.  Very good tasting and fun. Also make your own salads.  Healthy alternative to other quick service restaurants.

name: arthur montgomery
text: Fun place to go. You select the toppings from a salad bar of toppings and then make the pizza right fresh in front of you. It tasted very good and a very wide variety.

name: Luboslav Hvizda
text: Great food and good service. Dress code needs to include shirts that cover past the waist. Great place!

name: Ray Pratt
text: The pizza is fine, but not great. They used to have huge custom salads, but they've more or less discontinued those. The new salads offer limited customization and are served in tiny clamshell plastic containers that spill all over when you open, dress, and attempt to eat.

name: Tracey Craig
text: They always have great pizza and the staff is awesome! I highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Tim Rubbelke
text: Pizza here was pretty good. I'd describe this as a "quick serve" pizza place. You choose your toppings, they bake it and bring it out to you. Lots of choices.

name: Timothy Benoit
text: Fantastic food, quick service, nice atmosphere and the gentlemen working were above and beyond professional

name: James W
text: recently discovered this place and I love the pizzas. I thought that the pizzas were kind of small but I can easily feel full and stop about halfway. 9 bucks isnt a bad price for the pie's either

name: tburr
text: Kind service, clean dining area, and fresh food. A quality dining experience.

name: Laurie Jerram
text: Good thin pizza at a great price. So much better than the typical delivery pizza

name: matt f
text: Great pizza but I won't be going back because you are only limited to one size pizza. For most men the pizza size you get from Pieology is considered just a snack. I would give 5 stars if they had different size options for the pizza â€¦More

name: William Shirley
text: Able to customize at no additional cost - even adding meat. Pizza cooked fast at between 500 and 530 degrees F.  Pizza arrived while we were still eating salad.

name: Sonheris Gonzalez
text: One of the best pizzas I have tried in many states and countries. You're not going to regret!!!

name: Nicholas Nielson
text: This is a choose your own topping pizza place. The style is much like Chipotle or subway, but in my opinion, better. You can build your own or chose from their selection and then add any bonus toppings. We got the bbq chicken and the spicy â€¦More

name: Shandi Greve Penrod
text: lots of options, including whole wheat, vegan and gluten free in addition to the traditional high-gluten/white crusts and mozzarella cheese. very casual, very open seating area.

name: pavan kalantri
text: Ordered online for pick up & they did not even started working on it even when i reached for pick up. On top the servers were rude and not even sorry for delaying the order. â€¦More

name: Noza Rahman
text: Great selection of toppings. Delicious and healthy pizza! Highly recommended!

name: Anna Schmidt
text: It's like Subway but for pizza.  I love that it is the same cost no matter how many toppings I put on.  Extra cheese? Extra meat? No additional costs!

name: Cassandra Case
text: Friendly staff. Fresh ingredients. Good value.

name: Angie Danson
text: Great food and service, we frequently eat here for lunch and the food is delicious

name: Bill Wittke
text: Decent food.  Create your own pizza or salad.  Service is sometimes slow.

name: Hayden Clarke
text: I was so excited to try this place when I heard it was in Creve Coeur!  It lived up to all my expectations and more!  The pizza was amazing and the staff was super friendly and helpful, especially Kim!

name: Alex Paradissis
text: Short/no line.  As many toppings as you want.  Clean and cool.  Great lunch spot!

name: Makeesha Willingham
text: My Favorite pizza place to eat !My lunches be so fulfilling me my co-workers love this place!

name: Ramesh Rajagopalan
text: Good vegetarian options. Pie rise crust is great.

name: duane wesche
text: Great tasting pizza, fresh salads, quick service nice helpful staff

name: Themon Ryan
text: I've been to pieology restaurants all over the county. I deserves an apology for coming into this one. The pie cook who prepared mine literally pulled the pesto bag out and splattered an enormous glob on it. Then proceeded to put cheese on â€¦More

name: jsandroid55
text: Good pizza, nice staff, the fountain soda is set perfectly

name: Cindy La
text: It was clean and open, but most of all the pizza was so good! The crust was thin and crispy, there wasn't a line at the time we went (Thursday late dinner) and the toppings were fresh.

name: Wanted Puppy
text: Very good service, I go there once a week

name: Phil Schaefer
text: This pizza is amazing. Customized to your pleasing. I recommend the Buffalo chicken pizza.

name: tammy dunn
text: Love this place!   Love building my own personal pizza.  Nobody looks at me like I'm crazy when i want artichokes on my pizza.   Lol

name: Lisa Savvy
text: great place! clean and the food was VERY good!

name: gerry sequeira
text: Great ingredients, friendly service, fast pizza, and really tasty

name: Srikanth Manne
text: Awesome! I just love their customization for the price.

name: Ashley McKinney
text: Great pizza but really slow service. Don't go if you're in a rush. If you have time, it's worth it.

name: Derek Ward
text: Great food and friendly workers. They also had great options for people with Gluten Allergies.

name: Jaime Carbone
text: First time there, they were delicious and the staff was excellent. Will def be back.

name: Brian Everett
text: Waited 25 minutes in line today for a pizza that takes under 5 minutes to cook. There were only 3 people working. I had been here many times prior and it never seemed to take that long. I'm not sure if something changed. I asked the manager â€¦More

name: Leonard Hyman
text: The salad was good but the salad maker was not a happy camper.

name: Igor Spektor
text: Good pizza and reasonable price. You can "build" it yourself.

name: Manisha F
text: They are friendly, clean and knowledgeable on their items. Love it.

name: John Behan
text: Custom personal pizzas and salads, a base price for each with unlimited toppings

name: Ric Comana
text: Love the make your own. Ready quickly and very tasty

name: David Deves

name: David Zar
text: It's fine. Nothing special, though. Crust was a bit under done and tasteless, but found are very good.

name: Donald Embree

name: Andrea Penner
text: Love their pizza the best  u make ur pizza by telling them how u want it make and what u want for it they have 3 kinds of crust 4 sauces lots of veggies and  10 meats tastes Delicious  and it's only 895 plus tax and u can have as much on ur pizza as u want
